header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Clause 1, page 1, line 4, leave out “2017” and insert “2020”
000: Clause 1, page 1, leave out lines 8 and 9 and insert—
text.IndentOne: “Should the United Kingdom remain a member of the European Union or leave the European Union?”

text.quote: 000: Clause 1, page 1, line 10, leave out subsection (5) and insert—

“(5) The Secretary of State shall, by order, ensure that the ballot papers used in Wales, shall include the question, as defined in subsection (4) in a bilingual English/Welsh format, in which both languages shall have equal prominence.”
